PerfectNetExp.abs: 欺诈的相关英语词汇大全 - n词酷英汉词典 ... crookedness2.  欺骗，狡诈，不老实 bunco1. 骗局 wangle1.  哄骗，用计获得.

derivation.yuyuan_name: late 19th cent.: perhaps from Spanish banca, the name of a card game

means.word_mean: 1. a swindle in which you cheat at gambling or persuade a person to buy worthless property

sentences.sentence: "He swindled me out of my inheritance"
"She defrauded the customers who trusted her"
"the cashier gypped me when he gave me too little change"

auth_sentence.content: Meanwhile, Dezenhall's private dicks discovered that the couple were bunco artists with rap sheets for prior extortion schemes.
